data.message: Hey Facebook, can you fix your "people you may know" algorithm? I most assuredly do not know any of the people you're suggesting. Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Shane. We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1vWRdxr -Ryan
I belive that the people u may knowthing is for people u may know, if u dont know them thats okay, u dont have to fix it, its only for people u may know! :)
always asking which items we want to see.  None would be nice.  I have absolutely no use for sports of any kind.
